round-duration-err: Round duration should be up to 10 minutes
show-score-during-game: Show team scores during the game
words-count-per-round: Number of words should be from 1 to 100
not-enough-teams-error: At least 2 teams needed to start the game
not-enough-players-error: At least 1 player needed in each team
empty-team-name-error: Empty team name is not allowed
existing-team-name-error: Team with this name already exists
empty-player-name-error: Empty player name is not allowed
existing-player-name-error: Player with this name already exists
fill-players: 1) Fill in player names on the main screen
do-you-want-to-exit-game: Do you really want to exit the game? App version v{{version}}
left-seconds-content: Your team has finished the round. You have {{actualLeftTimeInTour}} seconds left. Do you want to carry over the remainder for next time or be the first to start a new round with this time?
statistics-general-easiest-word: The easiest word is {{word}}. The Teams spent only {{duration}} seconds to guess it
statistics-general-hardest-word: The hardest word is {{word}}. The Teams spent significant {{duration}} seconds to guess it
statistics-tour-best-team: Best team is {{team}}, in which players guessed {{wordCount}} words
statistics-tour-best-player: Best player is {{player}} from team {{team}} managed to successfully ask {{wordCount}}
statistics-tour-easiest-word: The easiest word is {{word}}. Team {{team}} spent only {{duration}} seconds to guess it
statistics-tour-hardest-word: The hardest word is {{word}}. Team {{team}} spent significant {{duration}} seconds to guess it
